attributes.action: Cease to interfere with the release, and refuse to accept into Britain after release any of the five non-uk citizens currently held in Guatanamo bay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British Govt.has been duped by President Bush into campaigning for the release of, and the accepting of five non-British detainees from Guantanamo Bay. Bush has five less to look after, and can been seen to be closing down the camp, while Britain has another five unknowns to contend with. And yet another promise that the security service will keep tabs on them, just like all the others that they have no-idea of their whereabouts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
